page.title: 12Ilford Postman 1985
page.content:
{Postman Storey 1985 {My dad}gets up at 4.15am. He gets his breakfast and sets off for work in his car. He goes to{Ilford Post Office}and collects the large van and then he goes to the{Romford Post Office.}He arrives there at 5 o'clock. He sorts the{letters}and{parcels}for his round, puts them in his van and then sets off with another man. First, they deliver the parcels by van and then they park the van and deliver the letters to each house on foot. Sometimes the weather is bad and it makes him feel miserable. He gets back to the depot by about 1O o'clock. He finishes off his work and at 11 o'clock he leaves for home.
Chadwell Heath Primary School
